results.title: Effects of metformin on retinoblastoma growth in vitro and in vivo
results.text_hl: For this reason, we investigated the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Retinoblastoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012175 @@@retinoblastoma cancer@@@ cell lines in vitro and in vivo.
